verses.verse: And he showed <S%H7200><s%> me <S%H853><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and Satan <S%H7854><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> his right hand <S%H3225><s%> to resist <S%H7853><s%> him.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Satan, <S%H7854><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> thee, O Satan; <S%H7854><s%> even the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that hath chosen <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> thee: is not <S%H3808><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> a brand <S%H181><s%> plucked <S%H5337><s%> out of the fire? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H784><s%>
Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> with filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel. <S%H4397><s%>

And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> those that stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> Take away <S%H5493><s%> the filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> him. And unto <S%H413><s%> him he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have caused thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, and I will clothe <S%H3847><s%> thee with change of raiment. <S%H4254><s%>

And I said, <S%H559><s%> Let them set <S%H7760><s%> a fair <S%H2889><s%> miter <S%H6797><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his head. <S%H7218><s%> So they set <S%H7760><s%> a fair <S%H2889><s%> miter <S%H6797><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him with garments. <S%H899><s%> And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> stood by. <S%H5975><s%>
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> protested <S%H5749><s%> unto Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> If <S%H518><s%> thou wilt walk <S%H1980><s%> in my ways, <S%H1870><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> my charge, <S%H4931><s%> then thou <S%H859><s%> shalt also <S%H1571><s%> judge <S%H1777><s%> <S%H853><s%> my house, <S%H1004><s%> and shalt also <S%H1571><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> my <S%H853><s%> courts, <S%H2691><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> thee places to walk <S%H4108><s%> among <S%H996><s%> these <S%H428><s%> that stand <S%H5975><s%> by.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> O Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and thy fellows <S%H7453><s%> that sit <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee: for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are men <S%H376><s%> wondered <S%H4159><s%> at: for, <S%H3588><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will bring forth <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> the BRANCH. <S%H6780><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> behold <S%H2009><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have laid <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Joshua; <S%H3091><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> one <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> eyes: <S%H5869><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will engrave <S%H6605><s%> the graving <S%H6603><s%> thereof, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> and I will remove <S%H4185><s%> <S%H853><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> land <S%H776><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

In that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> shall ye call <S%H7121><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> under <S%H413><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the vine <S%H1612><s%> and under <S%H413><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the fig tree. <S%H8384><s%>
